pageContent: Purpose of review: To review current evidence for prostate cancer prevention with nutrition, physical activity, and lifestyle interventions and identify future research directions.

metaData.source:
Prospective assessment of voiding and sexual function after treatment for localized prostate carcinoma: comparison of radical prostatectomy to hormonobrachytherapy with and without external beam radiotherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11391584/
